nodes.bodyText: Suggest moving it to AbstractTypescript codegen. I believe the purpose of CodegenConstants is to store stuff that is applicable to many if not all generators. While the change introduced in this PR is very typescript-specific
Gotcha. I was following the pattern of SUPPORTS_ES6 above, but it does seem a bit too broad.

I see! Yeah it looks inconsistent across the app. SUPPORTS_ES6 was introduced years ago, but some later addition (NPM_VERSION, etc) are made directly in AbstractTypescript, which makes more sense to me.
